column5: They have a 13'4" fishing kayak for sale at costco, complete with paddle.  It's a sit on top and looks pretty decent.  Seems like a decent deal for $399.  In case anyone's looking.
That sounds like a great deal, might need to take a look tomorrow.

I'm interested too. I've missed mine or the idea of having one since I sold it to buy my boat. Might look at this costco boat too. The return policy is amazing. Took back our vacuum after 38mo no questions asked,.,
Is it this one?  Seems like a good deal if it is.  I couldn't find it on the Costco website.   http://www.equinoxkayaks.com/products-1/equinox-angler-12-0.html
That's pretty much what they are selling.
What location was it? Looks pretty decent for the price
I saw it in their Burlington location last weekend.
This is the one I saw in the Ajax store.  It was $75 off; but that ends today.  http://www.costco.ca/Pelican%E2%84%A2-Odyssey-100X-Kayak-.product.100149295.html
